DOC.brief_title: Clinical Safety New Infant Starter Formula Containing 2 Human Milk Oligosaccharides ( HMOs )
DOC.criteria: Healthy baby Full term baby ( 37 week ≤ gestation ≤ 42 week ) birth weight 2500 g 4500g Having obtain baby 's legal representative 's informed consent . FF group : baby age birth 14 day , exclusively formulafed time enrollment , whose mother independently elect , enrollment , breastfeed • BF group : baby age 3 month ( +/ 5 day ) , exclusively breastfed since birth .
